It's the one he says during the Boshin-sensou, right? Something like "I know 
I'm not going to win. The Tokugawa shogunate is going down, and it'd be a 
shame if no one were to go down with it." My guess would be that it would be 
in volume 2 of the Japanese version. Sorry I can't help you more than that. 
Watashi mo sono shosetsu wo motteirun desuga, ima wa hikkoshi-chuu dakara, 
kyuu ni hako ni hatteimasu. Gomen nasai.

To my knowledge, "Moeyo Ken" does not exist in English, though I have 
translated passages from its first chapter here and there.

-M.
